channel.title: Authors on Pengpeng Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Pengpeng Liu

item.description: I am currently a Ph.D. student in Computer Science and Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK), supervised by Prof. Michael R. Lyu and Prof. Irwin King. Before that, I got the B.Eng. degree in the Department of Electronic Engineering, Tsinghua University. My research interests include computer vision, deep learning and machine learning. Our SelFlow is the 1st place winner on Sintel Optical Flow Benchmark since November 2018. I am currently looking for research internship or academic visit opportunities.
